EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: MIMED Portfolio Prospects Data Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: A data form for editing MIMED portfolio prospects records
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: UM Dev

c:Constraint.Name: CK_PROSPECT_VALIDMANAGERSTARTDATE
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The new prospect manager's start date must be on or after the end date of the current prospect manager.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_PROSPECTMANAGERHISTORY_VALIDDATERANGE
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The new prospect manager's start date must be on or after the end date of the current prospect manager.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_PROSPECTMANAGERHISTORY_VALIDCONSTITUENT
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The new prospect manager's start date must be on or after the end date of the current prospect manager.

c:Exception.c:CustomErrorMsg: The fundraiser has already been assigned to that prospect as the prospect manager.
The new prospect manager's start date must be after the current prospect manager's start date.
The current user does not have rights to the selected prospect from this form.
